Hi there, I'm Elsa. I help small business owners start and maintain their websites, along with content creation.

I'm a web developer based in Joshua Tree, CA. I became interested in programming when I wanted to bring my own passion projects to life, and learned how to do so using javascript or php projects

My days are spent creating niche websites and solutions for small business owners and creatives.

Expertise gained through project learning and combining unique niches. Tagline: 'the world is so niched now, I can help people combine their own random niches, and create unique niche!!!-'

paragraph1: I've gained experience through project learning

paragraph1: PHP WP- y desire to learn js was initated by wanting to be more creative, and to build my 4 projects. By experiencing the process of building up these websites, I've gained not only an ability to work with unique colors, and to learn the skills needed to become a very developer.

You can contact me by emailing: elsahvy@gmail.com

I am always looking for opportunities to further my skills... and to work with other like-minded people in tech. Email is the best way to get in touch, you can also find me at instagram and linkedIn

Laughing Coyote Dev

FEATURED WORK--- CREATE LONGER VERSION- About ::: a digital creative studio where clients' visions (userstories??) are translated into vivid, handcrafted websites.

Most web design services focus on tech, speed, or business optimization. Few lean into artisanal design, emotional storytelling, and cozy aesthetics the way this concept (lc) does.

TARGET AUDIENCE

The people I'm looking to serve...

Unique Selling Point: You're not just designing websites—you’re co-creating digital homes for passionate people. You get their creative process because you share it. More than just a website, a viewing experience that conveys your message.

MAIN GOAL OF SITE"

Custom digital artistry refers to the practice of crafting digital designs—like websites, illustrations, or interfaces—that are:

title

paragraph 1

No, the “Canvas & Code” concept—positioning web design as a collaborative, artistic process tailored specifically for creatives—is relatively niche and underused.

That said, a handful of designers do operate in adjacent spaces (e.g.,studio brands targeting indie artists or feminine brands), but your unique blend of handmade feel + custom digital artistry gives you a strong point of differentiation.

Highly Personalized

Tailored to the client’s creative style, voice, and aesthetic. Informed by the client’s artwork, medium, or story

Audience message: to feel good about having a site that displays their own messages

Avoids templates and generic layouts in favor of expressive, unique design elements. What separates web developers from Ai? Human innovation!

Artistically Driven

Prioritizes mood, composition, and visual storytelling over corporate polish

p2-Often includes hand-drawn elements, textures, painterly color palettes, or collage-style layouts

p3- Draws inspiration from fine art, zines, sketchbooks, journals, or craftwork

Crafted in Code

Combines the fluidity of visual art with the structure of web development

Responsive and functional, but emotionally resonant and alive. May include interactive touches like hover effects, transitions, or animations that feel whimsical or tactile

So when you say you offer custom digital artistry, you're saying: “I don’t just build websites—I co-create digital experiences that feel like an extension of your creative work, using thoughtful design, expressive visuals, and personal attention.

Key Features/Offers:

  • Portfolio-First Design: Build sites that feel like immersive galleries or journals.
  • Storytelling Frameworks: Let creatives tell their brand story visually and emotionally.
  • Creative Companion Calls: A process that feels more like an artist collaboration than a business transaction. Think of each site as a collaborative artwork: your client brings the inspiration, and you bring the technical brushstrokes
  • “Palette Picker” Questionnaire: Help clients choose colors based on their work and style.

Do you sound like one of the target audience? CTA to LC
